description: Maestro is an unplayable Universal Champion

1.name: Triplicate ISO Blast
1.description: Two ISO-infused blasts from his gauntlets, followed quickly by a massive blast from his armor.

2.name: Soulsword & Godslayer
2.description: Two swords from two powerful female warriors, now being used to cut down Maestro's foes.

3.name: ISO Power Unleashed
3.description: For a brief time, Maestro lets his inner gamma-irradiated self loose. He smashes his opponent, then unleashes the full power of his ISO-Gauntlet.

signature.name: ISO Inversion
signature.description: Maestroâ€™s control over the Contest turns enemy ISO infusions upon themselves.
